com.io7m.jcanephora.core.api

Interface JCGLFramebuffersType


  • public interface JCGLFramebuffersType
    The interface to OpenGL framebuffer objects.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • framebufferNewBuilder

        JCGLFramebufferBuilderType framebufferNewBuilder()
                                          throws JCGLException
        Retrieve a new framebuffer object builder. The returned builder can be used indefinitely but is tied to the JCGLContextType upon which it was created.
        Returns:
        A new framebuffer object builder
        Throws:
        JCGLException - On OpenGL errors

      • framebufferAllocate

        JCGLFramebufferType framebufferAllocate(JCGLFramebufferBuilderType b)
                                 throws JCGLException

        Allocate and bind a framebuffer object based on the values given in b.

        Calling this method will unbind any currently bound draw framebuffer. The resulting framebuffer, if any, will remain bound when the method returns.

        Parameters:
        b - The framebuffer object builder
        Returns:
        A new framebuffer object
        Throws:
        JCGLException - On OpenGL errors

      • framebufferDrawAnyIsBound

        boolean framebufferDrawAnyIsBound()
                           throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        true iff any application-created draw framebuffer is currently bound.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferDrawBind

        void framebufferDrawBind(JCGLFramebufferUsableType framebuffer)
                  throws JCGLException
        Bind the given framebuffer framebuffer to the draw target.
        Parameters:
        framebuffer - The framebuffer.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferDrawGetBound

        Optional<JCGLFramebufferUsableType> framebufferDrawGetBound()
                                                     throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        Some(framebuffer) iff any application-created draw framebuffer is currently bound.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferDrawIsBound

        boolean framebufferDrawIsBound(JCGLFramebufferUsableType framebuffer)
                        throws JCGLException
        Parameters:
        framebuffer - The framebuffer.
        Returns:
        true iff framebuffer is currently bound to the draw target.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferDrawUnbind

        void framebufferDrawUnbind()
                    throws JCGLException

        Unbind the current framebuffer from the draw target.

        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferDrawValidate

        JCGLFramebufferStatus framebufferDrawValidate()
                                       throws JCGLException

        Determine the validity of the currently bound draw framebuffer.

        Returns:
        The status of the framebuffer.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferGetDrawBuffers

        List<JCGLFramebufferDrawBufferType> framebufferGetDrawBuffers()
                                                       throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        The available set of draw buffers.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferGetColorAttachments

                                                                      throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        The available set of color attachment points.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

      • framebufferReadAnyIsBound

        boolean framebufferReadAnyIsBound()
                           throws JCGLException
        Returns:
        true iff any application-created read framebuffer is currently bound.
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.

                    throws JCGLException

        Throws:

      • framebufferBlit

        void framebufferBlit(com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType source,
                     com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType target,
                     Set<JCGLFramebufferBlitBuffer> buffers,
                     JCGLFramebufferBlitFilter filter)
              throws JCGLException
        Copy a region of the current read framebuffer to the current draw framebuffer.
        Parameters:
        source - The area of the read framebuffer from which to copy.
        target - The area of the draw framebuffer to which to copy.
        buffers - The set of buffers that should be copied.
        filter - The filter used when stretching (if source != target).
        Throws:
        JCGLException - Iff an OpenGL exception occurs.
